input.sentences: the fireworks in the spy resembled flashing sparks going off .
this is a view of the bridge before the fireworks started going off .
the city sky line is so beautiful at night .
fireworks bursting in the sky as the onlookers enjoy the show .
after the fireworks were over the moon came out to shine through the fog .
output.sentences: We went to see the firework show downtown and it was absolutely spectacular.
We hit some traffic as we were crossing the bridge to get downtown, but we were able to see them when they started since the view from the bridge is one that can't easily be beat.
As we sat on the bridge, I could see the skyline of the city and it still takes my breath away when I see it.
We finally made it across the bridge and I decided to capture the photo of the fireworks and the bridge.
The sky and moonlight is always foggy yet beautiful after a huge fireworks show.
